mapper.sql: id AS "id", type AS "type", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", material_type AS "materialType", material_name AS "materialName", material_sku AS "materialSku", replenishment_threshold AS "replenishmentThreshold", operator AS "operator", create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and material_type_id = #{paramCondition.materialTypeId}
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and replenishment_threshold like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.replenishmentThreshold},'%')
and operator = #{paramCondition.operator}

select
from wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and replenishment_threshold like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.replenishmentThreshold},'%')
and operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

SELECT wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.id AS "id", wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.type AS "type", wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.material_type AS "materialType", wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.material_name AS "materialName", wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.material_sku AS "materialSku", wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.replenishment_threshold AS "replenishmentThreshold", wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.operator AS "operator", wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.create_time AS "createTime", wms_material_type.di_batchNo AS "diBatchNo", wms_material_type.plant AS "plant", wms_material_type.sizes as "sizes", sys_user.`name` as "name", sys_user.account as "account" FROM wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf LEFT JOIN wms_material_type on wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.material_type_id=wms_material_type.id LEFT JOIN sys_user on wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.operator=sys_user.NAME where 1 = 1
and wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.replenishment_threshold like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.replenishmentThreshold},'%')
and wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
and wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf.create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and wms_material_type.plant like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.plant},'%')
and wms_material_type.di_batchNo like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.diBatchNo},'%')
and wms_material_type.sizes like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sizes},'%')
and sys_user.account like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.account},'%')
and sys_user.`name` like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.name},'%')

select
from wms_intelligent_cabinet2_conf where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and replenishment_threshold like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.replenishmentThreshold},'%')
and operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
